General.Name: Nuode Investment Co Ltd
General.Description: Nuode New Materials Co.,Ltd. researches and develops, produces, and sells electrolytic copper foils for lithium battery in China and internationally. Its products include 3.5-8 micron lithium copper foils, microporous and ultra-thick copper foils, and 5g high-frequency standard copper foils for communication. The company was formerly known as Nuode Investment Co.,Ltd and changed its name to Nuode New Materials Co.,Ltd. in October 2022. Nuode New Materials Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.
General.Address: Block A, No.1, Lvjing hongshuwan, Shenzhen, China, 518000
